<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get stack alignments. The frame must be aligned to the greatest of these:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> TargetAlign = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetframelowering/#a74d93035f53f5e8c2aaea5a8f307972d">getStackAlign</a>(); </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// alignment required per the ABI</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Alignment = std::max(TargetAlign, MaxAlign);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DisableRedZone = MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a977ddce262de45c645be23d951066351">getFunction</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#afb28a4deafe2954b0534cc6399ce518b">hasFnAttribute</a>(Attribute::NoRedZone);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: for PPC32 SVR4ABI, we can still generate stackless</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FitsInRedZone = FrameSize &lt;= Subtarget.getRedZoneSize();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check whether we can skip adjusting the stack pointer (by using red zone)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!DisableRedZone &amp;&amp; CanUseRedZone &amp;&amp; FitsInRedZone) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No need for frame</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the maximum call frame size of all the calls.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> maxCallFrameSize = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a4f335273c28b17552a7cfd802f42be2a">getMaxCallFrameSize</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Maximum call frame needs to be at least big enough for linkage area.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> minCallFrameSize = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcframelowering/#a50ec4d7eb2c3cc1d2d6cac266d4ea3eb">getLinkageSize</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">  maxCallFrameSize = std::max(maxCallFrameSize, minCallFrameSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we have dynamic alloca then maxCallFrameSize needs to be aligned so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that allocations will be aligned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a0509430713d587eba74220a8375948a8">hasVarSizedObjects</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">    maxCallFrameSize = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(maxCallFrameSize, Alignment);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update the new max call frame size if the caller passes in a valid pointer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NewMaxCallFrameSize)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#42;NewMaxCallFrameSize = maxCallFrameSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Include call frame size in total.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">  FrameSize += maxCallFrameSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure the frame is aligned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">  FrameSize = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(FrameSize, Alignment);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FrameSize;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.end(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a> != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.begin();) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlight">      --<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MO : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>-&gt;operands()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!MO.isReg())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MO.getReg()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PPC::FP:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlight">          MO.setReg(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvframelowering-cpp/#a1dd46e82704007e1b3b83ee229ffa79f">FPReg</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PPC::FP8:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlight">          MO.setReg(FP8Reg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PPC::BP:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlight">          MO.setReg(BPReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PPC::BP8:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlight">          MO.setReg(BP8Reg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;  This function will do the following:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    - If MBB is an entry or exit block, set SR1 and SR2 to R0 and R12</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      respectively (defaults recommended by the ABI) and return true</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    - If MBB is not an entry block, initialize the register scavenger and look</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      for available registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    - If the defaults (R0/R12) are available, return true</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    - If TwoUniqueRegsRequired is set to true, it looks for two unique</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      registers. Otherwise, look for a single available register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      - If the required registers are found, set SR1 and SR2 and return true.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      - If the required registers are not found, set SR2 or both SR1 and SR2 to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">        PPC::NoRegister and return false.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    Note that if both SR1 and SR2 are valid parameters and TwoUniqueRegsRequired</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    is not set, this function will attempt to find two different registers, but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    still return true if only one register is available (and set SR1 == SR2).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">&#42;/</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">PPCFrameLowering::findScratchRegister(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UseAtEnd,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TwoUniqueRegsRequired,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &#42;SR1,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &#42;SR2)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regscavenger">RegScavenger</a> RS;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> R0 =  Subtarget.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcsubtarget/#a6622b99b3c00a3938d969957312b1b52">isPPC64</a>() ? PPC::X0 : PPC::R0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> R12 = Subtarget.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcsubtarget/#a6622b99b3c00a3938d969957312b1b52">isPPC64</a>() ? PPC::X12 : PPC::R12;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set the defaults for the two scratch registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SR1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#42;SR1 = R0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SR2) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a> (SR1 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Asking for the second scratch register but not the first?&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#42;SR2 = R12;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If MBB is an entry or exit block, use R0 and R12 as the scratch registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((UseAtEnd &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;isReturnBlock()) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (!UseAtEnd &amp;&amp; (&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;getParent()-&gt;front() == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UseAtEnd) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The scratch register will be used before the first terminator (or at the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end of the block if there are no terminators).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;getFirstTerminator();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a> == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;begin()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The scratch register will be used at the start of the block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regscavenger/#a4f1af6e587ae8846628561570b54e2ee">enterBasicBlock</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the two registers are available, we&#39;re all good.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that we only return here if both R0 and R12 are available because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// although the function may not require two unique registers, it may benefit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from having two so we should try to provide them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!RS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regscavenger/#a27037167fddcdde3b6207d025267bbfc">isRegUsed</a>(R0) &amp;&amp; !RS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regscavenger/#a27037167fddcdde3b6207d025267bbfc">isRegUsed</a>(R12))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the list of callee-saved registers for the target.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> &#42;CSRegs = RegInfo-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcregisterinfo/#aaeae02cd060afb658b3e1e17ad7e42c5">getCalleeSavedRegs</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acf6442108e21e7e5379feb8962de65b7">getParent</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get all the available registers in the block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BitVector BV = RS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regscavenger/#afaf92711851d9d2abd2ef7f6c1b68bf8">getRegsAvailable</a>(Subtarget.isPPC64() ? &amp;PPC::G8RCRegClass :</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     &amp;PPC::GPRCRegClass);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We shouldn&#39;t use callee-saved registers as scratch registers as they may be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// available when looking for a candidate block for shrink wrapping but not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// available when the actual prologue/epilogue is being emitted because they</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// were added as live-in to the prologue block by PrologueEpilogueInserter.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; CSRegs&#91;i&#93;; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a168122d6ac4ed2a8b722e01b592ad289">reset</a>(CSRegs&#91;i&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SR1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#42;SR1 = FirstScratchReg == -1 ? (unsigned)PPC::NoRegister : FirstScratchReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there is another one available, set the second scratch register to that.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, set it to either PPC::NoRegister if this function requires two</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or to whatever SR1 is set to if this function doesn&#39;t require two.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SR2) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SecondScratchReg != -1)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#42;SR2 = TwoUniqueRegsRequired ? <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a>() : &#42;SR1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now that we&#39;ve done our best to provide both registers, double check</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// whether we were unable to provide enough.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a568ff706b8c5991bd299c8c00b803897">count</a>() &lt; (TwoUniqueRegsRequired ? 2U : 1U))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need a scratch register for spilling LR and for spilling CR. By default,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we use two scratch registers to hide latency. However, if only one scratch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register is available, we can adjust for that by not overlapping the spill</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// code. However, if we need to realign the stack (i.e. have a base pointer)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and the stack frame is large, we need two scratch registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Also, stack probe requires two scratch registers, one for old sp, one for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// large frame and large probe size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlight">PPCFrameLowering::twoUniqueScratchRegsRequired(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PPCRegisterInfo &#42;RegInfo = Subtarget.getRegisterInfo();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PPCFrameLowering::stackUpdateCanBeMoved(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcregisterinfo">PPCRegisterInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/reginfo">RegInfo</a> = Subtarget.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcsubtarget/#aeefe52b8561be26c1281d79be439cd26">getRegisterInfo</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcfunctioninfo">PPCFunctionInfo</a> &#42;FI = MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#ab7feae1932b436c8630e247166ec42b7">getInfo</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcfunctioninfo">PPCFunctionInfo</a>&gt;();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Abort if there is no register info or function info.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/structs/reginfo">RegInfo</a> || !FI)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only move the stack update on ELFv2 ABI and PPC64.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Subtarget.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcsubtarget/#ad49c3ce74dc865eec4728be0850a7697">isELFv2ABI</a>() || !Subtarget.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcsubtarget/#a6622b99b3c00a3938d969957312b1b52">isPPC64</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check the frame size first and return false if it does not fit the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// requirements.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need a non-zero frame size as well as a frame that will fit in the red</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// zone. This is because by moving the stack pointer update we are now storing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to the red zone until the stack pointer is updated. If we get an interrupt</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inside the prologue but before the stack update we now have a number of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stores to the red zone and those stores must all fit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo">MachineFrameInfo</a> &amp;MFI = MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a54f334a9c8ca6d105eae383ae87e4524">getFrameInfo</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FrameSize = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a14c39a24bf6ebbe339ae8a453c7fdd11">getStackSize</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!FrameSize || FrameSize &gt; Subtarget.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcsubtarget/#a8e3633b3242b24aefa8db459348c92f0">getRedZoneSize</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Frame pointers and base pointers complicate matters so don&#39;t do anything</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if we have them. For example having a frame pointer will sometimes require</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a copy of r1 into r31 and that makes keeping track of updates to r1 more</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// difficult. Similar situation exists with setjmp.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetframelowering/#a0c361440fb8d1e36932e65c8cc8497e7">hasFP</a>(MF) || <a href="/docs/api/structs/reginfo">RegInfo</a>-&gt;hasBasePointer(MF) || MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a4b94e0ca517e149914aa0c34ee06c9fa">exposesReturnsTwice</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Calls to fast&#95;cc functions use different rules for passing parameters on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the stack from the ABI and using PIC base in the function imposes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// similar restrictions to using the base pointer. It is not generally safe</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to move the stack pointer update in these situations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcfunctioninfo/#a6207e730a0051bddd35b25e05407681a">hasFastCall</a>() || FI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcfunctioninfo/#a488e8422444868d47101cb1b7c3fd51d">usesPICBase</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Finally we can move the stack update if we do not require register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// scavenging. Register scavenging can introduce more spills and so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// may make the frame size larger than we have computed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> !<a href="/docs/api/structs/reginfo">RegInfo</a>-&gt;requiresFrameIndexScavenging(MF);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Regarding this assert: Even though LR is saved in the caller&#39;s frame (i.e.,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LROffset is positive), that slot is callee-owned. Because PPC32 SVR4 has no</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Red Zone, an asynchronous event (a form of &quot;callee&quot;) could claim a frame &amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// overwrite it, so PPC32 SVR4 must claim at least a minimal frame to save LR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((isPPC64 || !isSVR4ABI || !(!FrameSize &amp;&amp; (<a href="#a69189b7d95c4b78145d9dc25a3de148b">MustSaveLR</a> || HasFP))) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;FrameSize must be &gt;0 to save/restore the FP or LR for 32-bit SVR4.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Using the same bool variable as below to suppress compiler warnings.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SingleScratchReg = findScratchRegister(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get stack alignments.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> MaxAlign = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a3836203fac855ac3c5718b701bd13ffd">getMaxAlign</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad82de9da62635df78a534de0f16c1129">Log2</a>(MaxAlign) &lt; 16 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid alignment!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Frames of 32KB &amp; larger require special handling because they cannot be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// indexed into with a simple STDU/STWU/STD/STW immediate offset operand.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> isLargeFrame = !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1a1e51a5952c3afa00875df90e7ae6f8">isInt&lt;16&gt;</a>(NegFrameSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if we can move the stack update instruction (stdu) down the prologue</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// past the callee saves. Hopefully this will avoid the situation where the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// saves are waiting for the update on the store with update to complete.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> StackUpdateLoc = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MovingStackUpdateDown = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if we can move the stack update.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (stackUpdateCanBeMoved(MF)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::vector&lt;CalleeSavedInfo&gt; &amp;Info = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#aad474502cac7b22b83e74de089f8c81d">getCalleeSavedInfo</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/calleesavedinfo">CalleeSavedInfo</a> CSI : Info) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the callee saved register is spilled to a register instead of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stack then the spill no longer uses the stack pointer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This can lead to two consequences:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1) We no longer need to update the stack because the function does not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    spill any callee saved registers to stack.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2) We have a situation where we still have to update the stack pointer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    even though some registers are spilled to other registers. In</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    this case the current code moves the stack update to an incorrect</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    position.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In either case we should abort moving the stack update operation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CSI.isSpilledToReg()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><span class="doxyHighlight">        StackUpdateLoc = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><span class="doxyHighlight">        MovingStackUpdateDown = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FrIdx = CSI.getFrameIdx();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the frame index is not negative the callee saved info belongs to a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stack object that is not a fixed stack object. We ignore non-fixed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stack objects because we won&#39;t move the stack update pointer past them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FrIdx &gt;= 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#ae6e7e975f7a4e5d535be32068a7c67df">isFixedObjectIndex</a>(FrIdx) &amp;&amp; MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#adf98860d7f42290f873c82a981eb0ea6">getObjectOffset</a>(FrIdx) &lt; 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"><span class="doxyHighlight">        StackUpdateLoc++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><span class="doxyHighlight">        MovingStackUpdateDown = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need all of the Frame Indices to meet these conditions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If they do not, abort the whole operation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><span class="doxyHighlight">        StackUpdateLoc = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><span class="doxyHighlight">        MovingStackUpdateDown = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the operation was not aborted then update the object offset.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In the ELFv2 ABI, we are not required to save all CR fields.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NOTE: This is technically a violation of the ABI. The hash can be saved</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// up to 512 bytes into the Protected Zone. This can be outside of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// initial 288 byte volatile program storage region in the Protected Zone.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// However, this restriction will be removed in an upcoming revision of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ABI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (HasROPProtect) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="997"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the stack frame (i.e. the old SP), ideally, we would put the old</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="998"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SP into a register and use it as the base for the stores. The</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1108"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add Call Frame Information for the instructions we generated above.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (needsCFI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1112"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (HasBP) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1114"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Define CFA in terms of BP. Do this in preference to using FP/SP,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1115"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because if the stack needed aligning then CFA won&#39;t be at a fixed</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1199"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1200"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For 64-bit SVR4 when we have spilled CRs, the spill location</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1201"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is SP+8, not a frame-relative slot.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1202"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (isSVR4ABI &amp;&amp; isPPC64 &amp;&amp; (PPC::CR2 &lt;= Reg &amp;&amp; Reg &lt;= PPC::CR4)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1203"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In the ELFv1 ABI, only CR2 is noted in CFI and stands in for</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1324"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Used to probe stack when realignment is required.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1325"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that, according to ABI&#39;s requirement, &#42;sp must always equals the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1326"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value of back-chain pointer, only st(w|d)u(x) can be used to update sp.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1327"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Following is pseudo code:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1328"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// final&#95;sp = (sp &amp; align) + negframesize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1329"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// neg&#95;gap = final&#95;sp - sp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1330"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// while (neg&#95;gap &lt; negprobesize) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1331"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   stdu fp, negprobesize(sp);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   neg&#95;gap -= negprobesize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1333"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1334"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stdux fp, sp, neg&#95;gap</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1335"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1336"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When HasBP &amp; HasRedzone, back-chain pointer is already saved in BPReg</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1337"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// before probe code, we don&#39;t need to save it, so we get one additional reg</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1338"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that can be used to materialize the probeside if needed to use xform.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1339"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, we can NOT materialize probeside, so we can only use Dform for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1340"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// now.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1341"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1342"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The allocations are:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1343"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if (HasBP &amp;&amp; HasRedzone) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1344"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   r0: materialize the probesize if needed so that we can use xform.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1345"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   r12: &#96;neg&#95;gap&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1346"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125; else &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1347"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   r0: back-chain pointer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1348"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   r12: &#96;neg&#95;gap&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1349"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1350"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> probeRealignedStack = &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1351"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1352"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> ScratchReg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> TempReg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1644"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxTCRetDelta = FI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcfunctioninfo/#a08f2debfe0bdcad74420a98b94d9e73b">getTailCallSPDelta</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1645"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;StackAdjust = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>-&gt;getOperand(1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1646"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(StackAdjust.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a76f61c6784df6dc8402a8b9011041926">isImm</a>() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expecting immediate value.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1647"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Adjust stack pointer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1648"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StackAdj = StackAdjust.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a38b28a85f818b49d8806c150b8a5b4f7">getImm</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1649"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Delta = StackAdj - MaxTCRetDelta;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1650"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((Delta &gt;= 0) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Delta must be positive&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1651"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MaxTCRetDelta&gt;0)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1653"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1654"><span class="doxyHighlight">        FrameSize += StackAdj;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1655"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1656"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1657"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1658"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Frames of 32KB &amp; larger require special handling because they cannot be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1659"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// indexed into with a simple LD/LWZ immediate offset operand.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1660"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> isLargeFrame = !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1a1e51a5952c3afa00875df90e7ae6f8">isInt&lt;16&gt;</a>(FrameSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1661"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1662"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// On targets without red zone, the SP needs to be restored last, so that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1663"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// all live contents of the stack frame are upwards of the SP. This means</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1664"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that we cannot restore SP just now, since there may be more registers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1665"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to restore from the stack frame (e.g. R31). If the frame size is not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1666"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a simple immediate value, we will need a spare register to hold the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1667"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// restored SP. If the frame size is known and small, we can simply adjust</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1668"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the offsets of the registers to be restored, and still use SP to restore</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1669"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// them. In such case, the final update of SP will be to add the frame</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1670"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// size to it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1671"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To simplify the code, set RBReg to the base register used to restore</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1672"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// values from the stack, and set SPAdd to the value that needs to be added</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1673"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to the SP at the end. The default values are as if red zone was present.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1674"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RBReg = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvframelowering-cpp/#a0e92b710da2e75e063fee5f7efb8f21e">SPReg</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1675"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t SPAdd = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1676"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1677"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if we can move the stack update instruction up the epilogue</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1678"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// past the callee saves. This will allow the move to LR instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1679"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to be executed before the restores of the callee saves which means</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1680"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that the callee saves can hide the latency from the MTLR instrcution.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1681"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> StackUpdateLoc = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1682"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (stackUpdateCanBeMoved(MF)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1683"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::vector&lt;CalleeSavedInfo&gt; &amp; Info = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#aad474502cac7b22b83e74de089f8c81d">getCalleeSavedInfo</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1684"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/calleesavedinfo">CalleeSavedInfo</a> CSI : Info) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1706"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1707"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1708"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1709"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FrameSize) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1710"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In the prologue, the loaded (or persistent) stack pointer value is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1711"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// offset by the STDU/STDUX/STWU/STWUX instruction. For targets with red</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1713"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1714"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the function has a base pointer, the stack pointer has been copied</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1720"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1722"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// enabled (=&gt; hasFastCall()==true) the fastcc call might contain a tail</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1723"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// call which invalidates the stack pointer value in SP(0). So we use the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1724"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value of R31 in this case. Similar situation exists with setjmp.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1725"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcfunctioninfo/#a6207e730a0051bddd35b25e05407681a">hasFastCall</a>() || MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a4b94e0ca517e149914aa0c34ee06c9fa">exposesReturnsTwice</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2053"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Allocate the nonvolatile CR spill slot iff the function uses CR 2, 3, or 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2054"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For 64-bit SVR4, and all flavors of AIX we create a FixedStack</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2267"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Insert alignment padding, we need 16-byte alignment. Note: for positive</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2268"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// number the alignment formula is : y = (x + (n-1)) &amp; (~(n-1)). But since</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2269"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we are using negative number here (the stack grows downward). We should</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2270"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// use formula : y = x &amp; (~(n-1)). Where x is the size before aligning, n</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2271"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is the alignment size ( n = 16 here) and y is the size after aligning.</span></CodeLine>
