<Link id="l02743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2743" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcframelowering/#add05bb6a2fc43dfa726b8a1a02d1b4c0"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcframelowering/#add05bb6a2fc43dfa726b8a1a02d1b4c0">PPCFrameLowering::updateCalleeSaves</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2744"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> &amp;SavedRegs)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2745"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The AIX ABI uses traceback tables for EH which require that if callee-saved</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2746"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register N is used, all registers N-31 must be saved/restored.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2747"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NOTE: The check for AIX is not actually what is relevant. Traceback tables</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2748"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on Linux have the same requirements. It is just that AIX is the only ABI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2749"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for which we actually use traceback tables. If another ABI needs to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2750"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// supported that also uses them, we can add a check such as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2751"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Subtarget.usesTraceBackTables().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2752"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Subtarget.isAIXABI() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2753"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Function updateCalleeSaves should only be called for AIX.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2754"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2755"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there are no callee saves then there is nothing to do.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2756"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SavedRegs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#aa19094c99ca405ec1efe38da727d27de">none</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2757"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2758"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2759"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> &#42;CSRegs =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2760"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Subtarget.getRegisterInfo()-&gt;getCalleeSavedRegs(&amp;MF);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2761"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> LowestGPR = PPC::R31;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2762"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> LowestG8R = PPC::X31;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2763"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> LowestFPR = PPC::F31;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2764"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> LowestVR = PPC::V31;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2765"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2766"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Traverse the CSRs twice so as not to rely on ascending ordering of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2767"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// registers in the array. The first pass finds the lowest numbered</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2768"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register and the second pass marks all higher numbered registers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2769"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for spilling.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2770"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; CSRegs&#91;i&#93;; i++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2771"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the lowest numbered register for each class that actually needs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2772"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to be saved.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2773"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> Cand = CSRegs&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2774"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!SavedRegs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a15d63c566878e964c19139b2c76c0dab">test</a>(Cand))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2775"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2776"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When R2/X2 is a CSR and not used for passing arguments, it is allocated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2777"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// earlier than other volatile registers. R2/X2 is not contiguous with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2778"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// R13/X13 to R31/X31.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2779"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Cand == PPC::X2 || Cand == PPC::R2) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2780"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SavedRegs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a62237ebe27691377a942abe7446332ec">set</a>(Cand);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2781"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2782"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2783"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2784"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PPC::GPRCRegClass.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/sandboxir/value-cpp/#a34433c37334a1cde3d58cde3099257dd">contains</a>(Cand) &amp;&amp; Cand &lt; LowestGPR)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2785"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LowestGPR = Cand;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2786"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PPC::G8RCRegClass.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/sandboxir/value-cpp/#a34433c37334a1cde3d58cde3099257dd">contains</a>(Cand) &amp;&amp; Cand &lt; LowestG8R)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2787"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LowestG8R = Cand;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2788"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((PPC::F4RCRegClass.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/sandboxir/value-cpp/#a34433c37334a1cde3d58cde3099257dd">contains</a>(Cand) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2789"><span class="doxyHighlight">              PPC::F8RCRegClass.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/sandboxir/value-cpp/#a34433c37334a1cde3d58cde3099257dd">contains</a>(Cand)) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2790"><span class="doxyHighlight">             Cand &lt; LowestFPR)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2791"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LowestFPR = Cand;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2792"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PPC::VRRCRegClass.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/sandboxir/value-cpp/#a34433c37334a1cde3d58cde3099257dd">contains</a>(Cand) &amp;&amp; Cand &lt; LowestVR)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2793"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LowestVR = Cand;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2794"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2795"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2796"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; CSRegs&#91;i&#93;; i++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2797"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> Cand = CSRegs&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2798"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((PPC::GPRCRegClass.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/sandboxir/value-cpp/#a34433c37334a1cde3d58cde3099257dd">contains</a>(Cand) &amp;&amp; Cand &gt; LowestGPR) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2799"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (PPC::G8RCRegClass.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/sandboxir/value-cpp/#a34433c37334a1cde3d58cde3099257dd">contains</a>(Cand) &amp;&amp; Cand &gt; LowestG8R) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2800"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ((PPC::F4RCRegClass.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/sandboxir/value-cpp/#a34433c37334a1cde3d58cde3099257dd">contains</a>(Cand) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2801"><span class="doxyHighlight">          PPC::F8RCRegClass.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/sandboxir/value-cpp/#a34433c37334a1cde3d58cde3099257dd">contains</a>(Cand)) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2802"><span class="doxyHighlight">         Cand &gt; LowestFPR) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2803"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (PPC::VRRCRegClass.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/sandboxir/value-cpp/#a34433c37334a1cde3d58cde3099257dd">contains</a>(Cand) &amp;&amp; Cand &gt; LowestVR))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2804"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SavedRegs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a62237ebe27691377a942abe7446332ec">set</a>(Cand);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2805"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2806"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2807"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2808" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcframelowering/#a2cd3c8e286f88d8f80913526cf5105e6"><span class="doxyHighlight">uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcframelowering/#a2cd3c8e286f88d8f80913526cf5105e6">PPCFrameLowering::getStackThreshold</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2809"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// On PPC64, we use &#96;stux r1, r1, &lt;scratch&#95;reg&gt;&#96; to extend the stack;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2810"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// use &#96;add r1, r1, &lt;scratch&#95;reg&gt;&#96; to release the stack frame.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2811"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Scratch register contains a signed 64-bit number, which is negative</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2812"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when extending the stack and is positive when releasing the stack frame.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2813"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To make &#96;stux&#96; and &#96;add&#96; paired, the absolute value of the number contained</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2814"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in the scratch register should be the same. Thus the maximum stack size</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2815"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is (2^63)-1, i.e., LONG&#95;MAX.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2816"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Subtarget.isPPC64())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2817"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LONG&#95;MAX;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2818"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2819"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetframelowering/#a309fabb5424f0b563465484f21775555">TargetFrameLowering::getStackThreshold</a>();</span></CodeLine>
